description.value: Can spend a Fate Point to grant you and a WP Bonus Allies immunity to Fear and Pinning, and - 10 to be hit by ranged or melee attacks for the duration fo the encounter. Can Burn a Fate point to allow an ally to resist a single attack and take no damage, must be burnt after hit but prior to damage roll.
